Title: Elevates promoting an obscene sexual performance by a child and promoting a sexual performance by a child to be class B felonies
Summary: Elevates promoting an obscene sexual performance by a child and promoting a sexual performance by a child to be class B felonies; prohibits pleading to a lesser offense after indictment for either such offense.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the penal law and the criminal procedure law, in relation to promoting sexual performances by a child
